turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for reaching out. This is Internet Support - what seems to be the issue with your connection today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Hi, my internet has stopped working.""It was fine this morning but now it won't connect."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, I see — the connection was fine earlier but now it won't connect. Could I get the name on your account so I can pull up your details?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm Ryota

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, Ryota, thanks. Could you tell me the address on the account so I can locate your service?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: The addess is Miller street

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for that. Just to confirm, could you give me the full street number on Miller Street?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: 345 Miller Street

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, got it - 345 Miller Street. When you look at your router right now, what lights do you see on it?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: My router show that red light

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, a red light usually means the router isn't getting a proper signal. Have you already tried restarting it by turning it off and on again?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, I tried three times but it couldn't working

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for trying that - sounds like the restart didn't help. Could you check quickly if all the cables at the bar' of the router are firmly plugged in? What do you see there?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes firmly plugged in

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, good to know everything's plugged in. When did the red light first appear — was it just a little while ago or earlier in the day?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm not sure but maybe little while ago

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, sounds like it started fairly recently. Are any of your other devices able to connect to the Wi-Fi at all, or is everything completely offline?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: My phone shows that Wi-Fi connected sign but I can't connect to the Internet

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, so your phone shows it's connected but there's no actual Interr & Vhen you try to open a website. does anv error messade abnear on your phone?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I can't. So is there a technician available today?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, we can look at getting a technician out.Before I check today's availability, could I have the best contact number for you in case the technician needs to reach you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, great — what's the best phone number for the technician to contact you on?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for that. To book the visit, what time today are you available for a technician to come by?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I’m free at afternoon

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, 1pm is noted. Just so the technician can get in smoothly, will someone be home at that time to let them in?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes I'm home at that time and let them in

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks. Before I lock in the 1 pm appointment, are you okay with the standard technician call-out fee if the issue is inside the unit rather than the building line?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes I'm okay

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, great. Shall I go ahead and confirm the 1 pm technician for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, the 1 pm technician appointment is now confirmed. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: That'll be all thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for calling — hope your internet's back up soon. Have a good day.
